testcase.classname: Vice Deans should be able to create a lesson
testcase.name: TC_01 Adding new Lesson as a Vice Dean - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "https://managementonschools.com/" homepage..............passed And clicks on loginIcon.....................................................passed And enters "uranuskohi" in the userName input field.........................passed And enters "Helloworld0" in the password input field........................passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed When click on Lessons.......................................................passed And enter "recruiter" in the Lesson Name....................................passed And check if Compulsory radio button is clickable...........................passed And click on Compulsory radio button........................................passed And add "5" in the Credit Score.............................................passed And click on Submit button..................................................passed Then verify the Lesson is created...........................................passed And close the application...................................................passed

testcase.classname: Vice Deans should be able to create a lesson
testcase.name: TC_02 Adding new Lesson without Credit Score as a Vice Dean - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "https://managementonschools.com/" homepage..............passed And clicks on loginIcon.....................................................passed And enters "uranuskohi" in the userName input field.........................passed And enters "Helloworld0" in the password input field........................passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed When click on Lessons.......................................................passed And enter "recruiter" in the Lesson Name....................................passed And check if Compulsory radio button is clickable...........................passed And leave "Compulsory radio button" empty...................................passed And don't add Credit Score..................................................passed And click on Submit button..................................................passed Then verify the Lesson is not created.......................................passed And close the application...................................................passed

testcase.classname: Vice Deans should be able to view the lesson list and make updates
testcase.name: TC_01 Being able to see the lesson details as a Vice Dean and update the information
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "https://managementonschools.com/" homepage..............passed And clicks on loginIcon.....................................................passed And enters "uranuskohi" in the userName input field.........................passed And enters "Helloworld0" in the password input field........................passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed When click on Lessons.......................................................passed And scroll down to Lesson List..............................................passed And vice dean can see the Lesson Name.......................................passed And vice dean can see the Compulsory field..................................passed And vice dean can see the Credit............................................passed And click on the last page..................................................passed And go to the last page.....................................................passed And go up...................................................................passed And vice dean is able to see and delete the created lesson..................passed And vice dean should be able to update the lesson...........................passed Then verify the lesson is deleted...........................................passed And close the application...................................................passed

testcase.classname: Students, choose lesson, grades and announcement
testcase.name: TC_01 Student goes and see her/his exam grade and meeting announcement
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "https://managementonschools.com/" homepage..............passed And clicks on loginIcon.....................................................passed And enters "uranus" in the userName input field.............................passed And enters "Madrid01" in the password input field...........................passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed When student goes to Choose Lesson Management...............................passed And student should be able to see the Teacher on the Choose Lesson List.....passed And student can see the day on the Choose Lesson List.......................passed And student should be able to see the StartTime on the Choose Lesson List...passed And student should see the StopTime on the Choose Lesson List...............passed And select the wanted Lessons...............................................passed And click on Submit button for add lesson...................................passed And student is able to see the chosen Lessons on the Lesson Program List....passed And student should be able to delete the chosen lesson from the list........passed And student is not able to delete the chosen lesson from the list...........passed And student should click on the menu and should be able to see the Main Menu List.passed And student should click on Grades and Announcements........................passed And student should be able to see his exam grades if it is added by their teacher in the Student Info List.passed And student should be able to see the meeting created by his advisor on the Meet List.passed And close the application...................................................passed

testcase.classname: Admin should be able to add Vice Dean
testcase.name: TC_01 Admin adding a Vice Dean - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "https://managementonschools.com/" homepage..............passed And clicks on loginIcon.....................................................passed And enters "AdminBatch197" in the userName input field......................passed And enters "Batch197+" in the password input field..........................passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed When admin is logged in the website.........................................passed And click on menu...........................................................passed And click on Vice Dean Management...........................................passed And admin should see the Vice Dean Management Filed.........................passed And enter name as "Madrid"..................................................passed And enter surname as "Madrid"...............................................passed And enter brith place as "Spain"............................................passed And select the "Male".......................................................passed And write the correct "12/25/1890"..........................................passed And enter phone number as "363-918-0845"....................................passed And write the SSN as "987-98-9876"..........................................passed And write the "madridspain".................................................passed And add "Madridspain0"......................................................passed And click on Submit button for Vice Dean creation...........................passed Then verify the Vice Dean is created........................................passed And close the application...................................................passed
